channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Plus de choix pour acheter son Navigo, mais pas de baisse des prix
item.description: Île-de-France Mobilités va devoir faire de la place aux apps rivales qui veulent vendre elles aussi des titres de transport, y compris le Navigo Liberté+. Ce dernier reste (restait ?) une exclusivité de l'app IDFM.

item.title: Funko’s ‘Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Pops Are Filled With Knightly Honor (Exclusive)
item.description: We might have to wait another year for more 'Knight of the Seven Kingdoms', but you can carry on your own Dunk and Egg adventures on your shelf, thanks to Funko.

item.title: How to watch Everton vs Man United: Live Streams, TV Guide, Preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Everton vs Man United live streams online and from anywhere, as the Toffees look to make it back-to-back victories over the Red Devils.

item.title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms season 2: what we know so far about the new Game of Thrones show's return
item.description: Here's what we already know about A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms season 2, which is already in production.

item.title: Particle’s AI news app listens to podcasts for interesting clips so you you don’t have to
item.description: AI news app Particle can now pull in key moments from podcasts, letting readers instantly play short, relevant clips alongside related stories.

item.title: Spotify rolls out AI-powered Prompted Playlists to the U.K. and other markets
item.description: Spotify continues to test its AI-powered “Prompted Playlists” feature, now rolling out the tool to Premium subscribers in the U.K., Ireland, Australia, and Sweden.

item.title: Beat the freeze with the coziest home essentials — from snuggly heated throws to mood-boosting lamps
item.description: Gadgets and homeware to keep out the chill.

item.title: 2,000-Year-Old Skulls Reveal How Vietnam’s Early Influencers Dyed Their Teeth Pitch Black—For Life
item.description: The discovery presents some of the oldest physical evidence that tooth-blackening trends in Vietnam have stayed consistent for a very, very long time.

item.title: Quelles performances attendre du futur MacBook pas cher ?
item.description: À quelques jours de la présentation attendue d'un nouveau MacBook « pas cher », penchons-nous sur les performances que l'on peut attendre d'une telle machine.

item.title: Finnish quantum unicorn IQM set to go public
item.description: Finnish unicorn IQM plans to go public via a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) valuing the company at approximately $1.8 billion — joining the growing cohort of quantum computing companies listed on U.S. stock markets.

item.title: Les meilleurs smartphones Realme : quel modèle choisir en 2026 ?
item.description: Relativement jeune, la marque Realme rencontrait un franc succès avec ses smartphones abordables. La croissance florissante du constructeur est désormais freinée dans son élan en Europe. On vous explique la gamme et on vous conseille les meilleurs smartphones Realme du moment.

item.title: Robotaxis are coming to London, but the city’s black cab drivers are skeptical. Here’s why
item.description: London’s ancient road layout could pose special challenges for the self-driving tech. The Ford Mustang Mach-E cruises down a London road choked with traffic, using its onboard AI system to avoid jaywalkers and cyclists, and navigate roadwork as it drives to its destination.The autonomous vehicle from British startup Wayve Technologies is on a test run ahead of the U.K. government’s robotaxi trials set to launch in the spring. Tech companies including U.S. company Waymo and China’s Baidu also plan to take part in the pilot program, making London the latest arena in the global robotaxi competiti...

item.title: The US Had a Big Battery Boom Last Year
item.description: Despite Donald Trump’s unrelenting attacks on renewable energy, there’s a quiet revolution happening on US grids.

item.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT water use claims are 'completely untrue' — but admits AI energy use is a concern
item.description: Sam Altman dismisses viral claims about ChatGPT’s water use — but the bigger question of AI’s growing energy and environmental impact remains unresolved.

item.title: Lamborghini is the Latest Automaker to Pull the Plug on Luxury EVs
item.description: The CEO of the supercar company says demand for high-end full electric cars is “almost zero.” Could this mean Ferrari's Luce will be dead on arrival?

item.title: Mullvad VPN takes its banned anti-surveillance ad to the streets after UK TV rejection
item.description: The Swedish VPN firm says attempts to raise awareness against mass surveillance with its "And Then?" campaign are getting halted in the UK. Here's all we know.

item.title: The end of experimentation with AI agents
item.description: This year marks a shift from AI pilots to full deployment—ushering in a new era of AI performance for enterprises.

item.title: Ditch the desktop tower: This Windows 11 Pro mini PC deal is perfect for home offices - but be quick, the clock is ticking on this $278 compact computer
item.description: The Kamrui E3B Mini PC delivers fast everyday performance in a compact, space-saving design, and it’s currently $161 off.

item.title: Discord distances itself from Persona age verification after user backlash
item.description: Discord is attempting to distance itself from the age verification provider Persona following a steady stream of user backlash. In an emailed statement to The Verge, Discord's head of product policy, Savannah Badalich, confirms the company "ran a limited test of Persona in the UK where age assurance had previously launched and that test has […]

item.title: Kohler’s new shower reuses dirty water to get you clean
item.description: Kohler claims its new Anthem EvoCycle smart shower system can deliver "up to 80% water savings" without the use of showerheads that limit flow or pressure. The system instead relies on a reservoir in the shower's base that collects used water and passes it through a filtration system before sending it back up through the […]

item.title: Historic East Coast Blizzard Knocks Out Power for Hundreds of Thousands—and It’s Not Over Yet
item.description: Utilities warn that outages could be prolonged as snow and high winds are interfering with restoration efforts.

item.title: Beat the RAM crisis: Get the TeamGroup DDR5-6000 RAM for under $200 right now using this voucher code
item.description: Save 25% on 16GB TeamGroup DDR5-6000 RAM using this voucher code — a huge price cut in a memory market that hasn’t been kind to PC builders lately.

item.title: Panasonic annonce un partenariat stratégique avec Skyworth pour son activité TV en Europe
item.description: Panasonic Entertainment & Communication Co.Ltd (PEAC) vient d'annoncer un partenariat commercial avec Shenzhen Skyworth Display Technology Co Ltd, l'un des principaux fabricants de téléviseurs au monde. Cette collaboration, qui entrera en vigueur le 1er avril 2026, modifie en profondeur le modèle de distribution des téléviseurs Panasonic sur le marché européen. Explications. ...

item.title: Apple’s AI Gadgets Don’t Sound Groundbreaking at All
item.description: Apple will reportedly focus on computer vision to make AI gadgets that sound a lot like other, existing, AI gadgets.

item.title: Working outdoors or in extreme conditions? The SanDisk Extreme Portable is one of the best external SSDs we ever tested— and it’s $250 off
item.description: The 4TB Sandisk Extreme Portable SSD delivers rugged protection and high-speed data transfers, making it a smart choice for professionals on the go.

item.title: Déjà très abordable, le prix de cet aspirateur robot laveur Xiaomi est quasiment divisé par deux pour un ménage sans efforts
item.description: Avec le Robot Vacuum S20, Xiaomi propose un aspirateur robot laveur d'entrée de gamme qui facilite l'entretien de votre domicile au quotidien. Un modèle d'entrée de gamme qui passe de 169,99 euros à 87,77 euros sur AliExpress.

item.title: VPN flaws allowed Chinese hackers to compromise dozens of Ivanti customers, says report
item.description: Chinese hackers allegedly broke into the network of an Ivanti subsidiary in 2021. The hackers exploited a backdoor in its VPN product, which allowed the hackers to gain access to 119 other unnamed organizations.

item.title: Wikipedia blacklists Archive.today after alleged DDoS attack
item.description: Wikipedia's consensus is to blacklist Archive.today after the site was involved in DDoS attacks launched against a blogger.

item.title: Go Inside the Worlds of Andrew Stanton’s Sweeping New Sci-Fi Film (Exclusive)
item.description: 'In the Blink of an Eye,' starring Rashida Jones, Kate McKinnon, and Daveed Diggs, hits Hulu February 27.

item.title: If Big Tech cared about fighting AI slop, it wouldn’t be drowning us in it
item.description: As 2025 drew to a close, Instagram head Adam Mosseri ended the year by doom-posting about AI. "Authenticity is becoming infinitely reproducible," Mosseri lamented. "Everything that made creators matter - the ability to be real, to connect, to have a voice that couldn't be faked - is now accessible to anyone with the right tools." […]

item.title: WWE Champion Drew McIntyre 'had them all' when it came to wrestling games: 'Those War Zone days were some of the greatest days of my life'
item.description: WWE Champion Drew McIntyre talks retro wrestling games, appearing in WWE 2K26's CM Punk mode, and what his own Showcase would look like.

item.title: After a few hours with WWE 2K26, the wrestling sim keeps getting better, even if the changes are not too flashy
item.description: After a lengthy hands-on with WWE 2K26, I feel like the series' winning streak will continue.

item.title: Claude Cowork, AI hype, and its real impact on white-collar work
item.description: Anthropic’s advanced AI agent that purports to do anything you can do at work is the ‘aha moment’ for the reinvention of the knowledge worker. Before the holidays, Adam Conner began vibe coding. Like everyone else in the know, he was using Claude Code. Compared to popular chatbots, Anthropic’s advanced AI agent speaks the language of computers: code. Normally, you click buttons in browsers, open folders, and drag files. But you can also do so by coding—interacting with software by typing commands into a terminal, a text-based app....

item.title: Mistral AI, le champion français de l’IA générative, accusé d’avoir pillé des œuvres pour son IA
item.description: La start-up française, qui a développé le chatbot conversationnel Le Chat, aurait utilisé des contenus protégés par le droit d'auteur pour entraîner son modèle de langage, selon une enquête de Mediapart.

item.title: The creators of Dark Sky have a new weather app
item.description: The team behind the beloved Dark Sky weather app has announced a new iPhone app called Acme Weather. The release comes after Apple's 2020 acquisition of Dark Sky, which it ultimately shut down in 2022 after integrating much of its tech into the native iOS Weather app. Acme Weather is primarily designed to address the uncertainty inherent in most forecasts, as different models yield disparate results and no two weather apps seem to report the same thing. Acme’s answer to this issue is “Alternate Predictions,” which shows users a range of possible outcomes alongside the app's core forecast line ...

item.title: Yep, it’s fast: Donut Lab’s solid-state battery gets its first test result
item.description: Since announcing earlier this year that it was on the cusp of a major battery breakthrough, Finnish startup Donut Lab has faced a lot of questions, and plenty of skepticism, about its production-ready, solid-state battery. Could the company really make a fast-charging battery at scale while avoiding some of the theoretical production headaches that have […]...

item.title: TV Panasonic Z85C : un nouvel OLED 120 Hz pour l’Europe
item.description: Avec la série Z85C, Panasonic introduit un nouveau téléviseur OLED 4K de milieu/haut de gamme spécifiquement destiné à l’Europe pour sa gamme 2026. L’idée est de continuer à commercialiser les haut de gamme Z95B et Z90B en parallèle.

item.title: A bourbon expert blind-tasted the top 100 U.S. whiskeys of 2025—and 1 legendary distillery dominated
item.description: Buffalo Trace’s Antique Collection lives up to the hype. Bourbon was once hailed as the poor man’s drink. The spirit has since developed, however, from a mass-market American staple into a luxury class, and limited releases, higher prices, and brands vying for prestige have caused a crowded top tier.

AOC’s G-Sync-compatible model with a 240Hz refresh rate and a near-instant response time is down to $379.99 at Best Buy, which matches the lowest price I’ve ever seen for a model with these specs. item.title: Roborock Saros 20 et Curv 2 Flow : les nouveaux aspirateurs-robots arrivent en France
item.description: Roborock annonce la commercialisation d’un nouvel aspirateur balai et de deux nouvelles séries d’aspirateurs robots connectés, chacune déclinée en deux modèles. Ces nouveautés, dévoilées lors du CES 2026, seront commercialisé à partir du 26 février 2026.

item.title: Comment résilier son forfait mobile ? Voici la démarche pas à pas !
item.description: Vous avez envie de changer de forfait, mais vous ne savez pas comment vous y prendre ? Sachez que résilier son ancien forfait est simple comme bonjour, mais il y a plusieurs choses à savoir avant de s'y prendre. Voici la procédure à suivre.

item.title: Corsair brade à -35 % son écran PC QD-OLED incurvé de 34 pouces (WQHD et 240 Hz) taillé pour le gaming
item.description: Le Xeneon 34WQHD240 de Corsair est un écran PC idéal pour jouer aux jeux vidéo grâce à son taux de rafraîchissement de 240 Hz et son temps de réponse de 0,03 ms. En ce moment, il est disponible pour 999,99 euros.

item.title: Tuta dévoile Tuta Drive, une solution de stockage chiffrée et européenne
item.description: Tuta lance Tuta Drive en version alpha. La marque allemande veut en faire une référence du stockage de données en respectant votre vie privée.

item.title: Xbox shakeup: Phil Spencer and Sarah Bond are leaving Microsoft
item.description: After nearly 40 years at Microsoft, Xbox chief and Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer is leaving the company, along with Xbox president Sarah Bond. Spencer’s retirement was announced in a memo from Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on February 20th, stating, “Last year, Phil Spencer made the decision to retire from the company, and since then […]

item.title: Le fondateur de VLC menace de quitter la France à cause du ministre de la Justice
item.description: Jean-Baptiste Kempf, créateur de VLC, le fameux couteau suisse de la vidéo, est en colère et menace de quitter la France, tout simplement. En cause : le ministère de la Justice empêche sa femme de devenir juge, malgré sa réussite au concours de l'ENM.

item.title: 2026: Beginning the year with an ethics-first strategy
item.description: Why founders must embed ethical redlines, reviews, and stopping rules before scaling.
